Monday, August 14, 2006

Recent Rails job postings from the Job Board

Posted by David

We’re going to start posting a summary of recent Rails job postings from the 37signals Job Board every few weeks. All of these positions are for Rails programmers, but be sure to click through for individual listings on the additional requirements:

  • Integrum Technologies, LLC in Phoenix, AZ
  • RedBubble in Melbourne, Australia
  • Uzanto in Delhi, India
  • Participatory Culture Foundation in Worcester, MA (telecommuting okay)
  • ClickStar Inc. in Santa Monica, CA 90401
  • Etail Source in CO
  • Medical Decision Logic, Inc. in Baltimore, MD
  • 5A in San Francisco, CA (telecommmute ok)
  • Procore Technologies in Santa Barbara, CA
  • Lime Wire LLC in New York, NY
  • Nature Publishing Group in New York, NY
  • Nature Publishing Group in New York, New York
  • IndustryNext in New York, NYC (Chelsea)
  • Ground Truth Vision in Malmö, Sweden/Copenhagen, Denmark
  • Mint Digital in New York, NY
  • space150 in Minneapolis, MN
  • Sapient in NYC
  • A leading Investment Bank in New York
  • Digital music startup in SF or NYC
  • Bitscribe in Los Angeles, CA
  • Vesaria in Rockland, NY
  • Leapfrog Online in Evanston, IL
  • Early Stage Start-up in San Francisco, CA
  • IndustryNext in Manhattan, NYC
  • Urbis, LLC in New York, New York

If you’re looking for Rails programmers, you can post a listing at the 37signals Job Board. The price is $250 for 30 days of air time.
